description:
Nice to be here, This course is completely free Japanese alphabet course! You cannot speak with out alphabet! Let's join today!!

What is the course about?

This course is the best materials for all beginners who are going to start learning Japanese. Before you learn Japanese, you should master Japanese character and pronunciation. This enables you to understand words, phrase, whatever you see and listen.

What kind of material are included?

  • Video lecture (Lecture, Check, Test)
  • Audio lecture for review
  • Writing materials

Features

  1. Every section has "Repeat After me".
    • There are intervals in every section. You can pronounce and train just after me.
  2. Video lecture shows "how to move mouth".
    • I show you the image of Character and mouth movement.
  3. Practical method to concentrate on learning.
    • Flash to remember the Hiragana, Katakana.
    • Continuous concentration on the Sections.
  4. By the time you realized that you will find yourself memorised Hiragana and Katakana with correct pronunciation.
  5. Very Rich Contents!

What are the requirements?

  • A computer with internet connection; you don't need a textbook to take this course.

How long will the course take to complete?

Recommend 7 days - 20 days, depends on how many course do you take in a day.

What is the target audience?

  • Anyone interested in Learning Japanese.

I am really exited in support your learning Japanese.

See you in lecture!!
title: Japanese Speed Master - Syllabary -
